channel.title: Ringtones
channel.description: Need a site that can give free ones without the need for signing up to any offers or such. I honestly don't feel like paying for them. I'd have my friends give me theirs, but they have no taste in music at all.

item.title: Ringtones
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:223589”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=293451.msg2362834#msg2362834 date=1217737894]

why bother? what’s wrong with using mp3s?

Some phones have file type/file size restrictions. Or he might not be able to transfer files to the phone.

I don’t have a USB cord in which to connect my phoen to my laptop with.
[/quote]

Would uploading/downloading the song to/from your own website be cheaper than paying for it and downloading?

Unless you don’t have internet on your phone…[/quote]

Crappy internet on my phone… and I don’t have my own website.

Read full topic
